title: Camera Scroll help
body: I have not played league in 3 months and when i decided to play it agian my camera will not scroll. I used to play locked screen and when my mouse hit the edge of the sceen it would unlock but now i cant seem to get the same camera settings that used to have. I cant find anything that has helped with my problem

replies.body:
Rineyy with the assist! {{summoner:30}} 

The 'Y' key by default is bound to the toggle lock camera feature, which keeps the camera centered on your champ. By hitting that you can turn it off and be able to freely move the camera around!

Im sorry i should try and explain myself better. I know how to turn on and off camera lock. Before i quit playing my camera would follow my character and would automatically unlock if my mouse hit the edge of my screen and could recenter my camera and would lock agian if i hit spacebar, i just cant seem to get the same camera settings

Hmmmm that's definitely strange. I'm not entirely sure what could cause that, but let's start by resetting your config files to see if that fixes it.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if that helps!

I have tried that a couple times before posting with no luck, i have also uninstalled and reinstalled the game just to see if that would help. I have been trying to play with unlocked all the time but im just not liking the feeling of it and been dampening my enjoyment of the game.

I feel you there, it really makes it hard to play to the best of your skills if you aren't used to how the controls are working. That camera thing may feel like a small issue, but it can definitely affect your gameplay. I'm not entirely sure what might be causing that, so let's get you set up with our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look much deeper into this for you!
